channel.title: Lists on StarAtt
channel.description: Recent content in Lists on StarAtt

item.title: FOSS List
item.description:
Everything listed works on Windows, macOS and Linux.

Web Browser

  • Floorp
  • Brave

General

  • HackMD (online collaboration)
  • LibreOffice (office suite)
  • Marktext (Markdown editor)
  • Syncthing (P2P synchronisation between devices)
  • Xplorer (file explorer)
  • ImageGlass (image viewer)
  • VLC Media Player (media player)
  • 7-Zip (file compressor and extractor)

Communication

  • Element
  • Jitsi Meet

Scorewriter

  • MuseScore
  • Frescobaldi (Lilypond)

DAW

  • Ardour
  • Zrythm

Graphic

  • Krita
  • Inkscape
  • GIMP
  • Darktable
  • Blender

Video

  • Kdenlive

PKMs

  • AFFiNE
  • Anytype

Misc

  • OBS Studio (screen recording, streaming)
  • Rustdesk (remote desktop)
  • Audacity (basic audio editing)
  • Bitwarden (password manager)
  • Nextcloud (NAS)
